name: Rotki
short_description: Privacy-focused portfolio tracker and analytics for crypto.
description: Privacy-focused portfolio tracker and analytics for crypto. Rotki is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, security, utility, bitcoin. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Rotki on your home server to privacy-focused portfolio tracker and analytics for crypto without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Rotki to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
